original_title: Drunk Sex Orgy: Extreme Speed Dating
overview: It's an over-the-top speed dating event DSO style, and that means we have a lot of new and anxious participants from Hungary, the UK, and the Czech Republic ready to see what the world-famous Drunk Sex Orgy madness is all about! Normally success at a speed dating event is based on conversation skills, but at this special version we like to call Extreme Speed Dating it's all based on sex appeal so if you've got the goods you'll be speed fucking within 10 minutes or your money back!! This little event quickly cranks up the heat, and with a room full of horny guys and sex goddesses like Kate, Klarissa, Rihanna Samuel, Christina Lee, Nessa Devil, and Eliss Fire (to name a few), the initially civil fun and games turns into a slam-bangin' all-out stylish orgy that only Drunk Sex Orgy can pull off!
title: Drunk Sex Orgy: Extreme Speed Dating
